It was a normal day for our favorite ashikabi, Minato, he had just woken up from a good nights rest and started to get dressed for the coming day. But as he was putting on his jeans he felt two soft objects rise up against his back.
"Good mourning Minato-kun, did you sleep well?" A female voiced asked from behind as Minato immediatly turned red. He turned his head to the side to see none other than his alcohol addicted Sekirei, Kazehana, and it looks like she was already drunk.
"Kazehana-san, your already drunk...so early?" Minato asked as he felt a buldge in his pants probabl caused from the two soft objects pressed up against his pants. He tried to escape but Kazehana's inhuman strength proved to be to much.
"Minato-kun, your not running away are you? Are you scarred that your going to lack?" She asked nibbling his ear softly causing him to become more aroused.
Suddenly the two of them were engoulfed in ten gallons of water, causing both to snap back to reality. Minato's erection had quickly dissapeared cuasing Kazehana to lose her sex drive. And in the brief moment of weakness Minato escaped Kazehana's grasp and quickly crawled to the end of the room.
"You perverted woman! How dare you touch my Husband!" A blonde haired beauty yelled from the doorway.
"And good mourning to you aswell Tsukiumi, how was you sleep?"
"Don't try and change the subject! You were about to have sex with MY husband!" Tsukiumi walked over to Minato and bent over making the two eye levels meet. "And you, you were aroused by her, weren't you!?"
"Tsukimi-chan, no I wasnt I swear!" Minato said waving his hands back and forth with a slight blush on his face.
"You were, I can tell when you lie!" Tsukiumi yelled as she grabbed ahold of Minato's collar and raised him up into the air.
"Minato is not actually your husband, just cus you say so doesnt mean its true." Kazehana interrupted as she brushed some hair out of her eyes.
"How dare you question our undying love for each other, tell her Minato!" Tsukiumi said looking back at her 'beloved'.Minato started to sweat in fear.
"well, Tsukiumi, we need to have an actuall wedding you see..."
"MINATO!!!! TELL THIS PERVERTED WITCH THAT YOU AND ME ARE-"

BANG, BANG, BANG, BANG

"Sorry land lady..." Both Sekiei grunted as they left the room. Minato took a large sigh of relief and looked at Miya.
"Thank you Miya, I dont know what I would've done if you hadnt shown up."
"No problem Minato, just remember I'm always here to help." Miya said as she walked away.

Minato walked down stairs only to be greated by Matsu holding a box of junk and gadgets. She smiled at the sight of Minato and immediatly abandoned her box to tackle hug the man.
"Minato, good mourning!" She saidmaking sure her large breasts were brushing upagainst his chest.
"And good mourning to you Matsu, although I'm suprised to see you out of your room."
"Well you see I was just throwing out some old stuff." She exclaimed pointing to the box behind her.
"What is in that box any way?" Minato asked now curoius of its secrets.
"Just some old inventions I never found use for." She said shrugging but then like a brick it hit her. "Oh my god I forgot the other boxes, Minato no time to talk!" She rushed past him and back upstairs. Minato looked back at the box and curiousity got the better of him. He walked over to the cardboard box and opened it up. After digging through some useless junk he finally found a ray gun like toy that intrested him.He looked on the side to see some words etched into it saying 'Shrink ray-number34-final product.'
"A shrink ray? Why would Matsu invent this?" Minato asked himself. But unknown to our hero the gun was actually being held backwards by our poor minato. His finger slipped as he was hit by a blue ray of light. He watched as the world around him grew larger and larger until he finally stopped at a pre designated height of 5 cenimeters. "Wha!? It works it really works!?" Then it hit him. "OH CRAP IT WORKS! IT ACTUALLY SHRUNK ME!!!" He looked at his surroundings. "Aw man, I think I'm actually smaller then Ku-chans pinky toe..." But before Minato could even think of doing something else he felt the ground shake as he turned around to see Matsu walking back in.
"Opps forgot this!" She said putting the shrink ray back in the box and walking out of the room not hearing Minato's pleas for help. He tried to run after her but there was no way he could catch up to the goddess. He gave up hope as she turned the corner. He looked down and began to think of a way out of this. 1523112.content:
As Kusano was getting ready to take care of Minato, Tsukiumi entered the room in a rage. She had heard the conversation earlier, and she wasn't happy about it. Why was Minato being trusted to Kusano and not her?! She glared at the young girl and spoke.

"Hand him over, Kusano! I am Minato's wife! That means that I should be the one to take care of him!"

Kusano quickly pulled Minato incredibly close to her and held him protectively.

"No! Minato is mine! Musubi and Matsu trusted me to take care of him, and I won't let you take him away!"

Putting her hands on her hips and staring down at the much shorter sekirei, Tsukiumi smirked.

"Do you really think that you can stop me? I will no allow you to keep MY husband away from me! I'll take him from you even if I have to fight you for him!"

She then began forming a pair of water orbs in her hands. Kusano quickly ran over and grabbed the potted plant from her bedside table. She then balanced it on her head to prepare for battle. Her usual cute and cheerful face was now very serious.

"Fine Tsukiumi! If I have to fight you to protect my Minato, then I will!"

Tsukiumi didn't even respond. She simply threw the balls of water at Kusano in an attempt to strike her down quickly. Kusano easily dodged out of the way and produced a multitude of vines from the pot on her head. She skillfully manipulated the vines to restrain Tsukiumi's arms. Lifting the blond beauty into the air by her wrists, Kusano then wrapped vines around her legs as well. Tsukiumi began to struggle furiously to escape her bindings.

"What is the meaning of this?! Release me this instant, you insolent child!"

"No! I won't let you take Minato!"

Kusano then sent out several of the vines to wrap around Tsukiumi's waist. Using the vines around Tsukiumi's wrists, Kusano pulled her opponent's arms down to her sides and began to wrap her entire body into a cocoon of vines. Tsukiumi was now held in helplessly in the air, completely engulfed in vines, with only her head visible. Tsukiumi struggled even harder to escape her restraints, but it was producing no results thus far. Kusano lowered her captive down to face level and slapped her across the cheek.

"How dare you! You little brat! Let me go right now, or else!"

"Will you leave me and Minato alone now?!"

"N-never! You don't have any right to keep my husband from me!"

Kusano turned her back to the restrained sekirei and placed her hands on her hips.

"Well then, I'm just not gonna let you out!"

Kusano then looked back around and stuck her tongue out at Tsukiumi before turning away again.

"Why you disrespectful little... I'll teach you what happens to those who insult me!"

Tsukiumi then began struggling with more effort than ever before. This time, however, her attempts weren't so fruitless. She was slowly managing to push the vines off of her, and was confident that she could get out of the cocoon easily if she just continued with this amount effort. If she could escape from Kusano's trap, then she was certain that she could liberate Minato from her.

Just then...
